info.name: Support Chat API
info.description:
Complete API collection for Support Chat functionality. Works for both Vue3 frontend and Flutter mobile app.

## Authentication
All endpoints require Bearer token authentication. Include the token in the Authorization header:
`Authorization: Bearer {your_token}`

## Base URL
Replace `{{base_url}}` with your API base URL (e.g., `http://localhost:8000/api` or `https://yourdomain.com/api`)

## User Endpoints
Endpoints prefixed with `/support-chat` are for regular users.

## Admin Endpoints
Endpoints prefixed with `/admin/support-chat` are for admin users and require 'manage chats' permission.
